channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Performance Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21701|2024-08-03T18:23:29.409Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20performance%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Performance Plugin 3.20 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.
